node.description: A component for creating Notion pages.

data.description: A component for creating Notion pages.

code.value:
import requests
from typing import List

from axiestudio import CustomComponent
from axiestudio.schema import Record


class NotionUserList(CustomComponent):
    display_name = "List Users [Notion]"
    description = "Retrieve users from Notion."
    documentation: str = "https://developers.notion.com/reference/get-users"
    icon = "NotionDirectoryLoader"
    
  
    def build_config(self):
        return {
            "notion_secret": {
                "display_name": "Notion Secret",
                "field_type": "str",
                "info": "The Notion integration token.",
                "password": True,
            },
        }
        
    def build(
        self,
        notion_secret: str
    ) -> List[Record]:
        url = "https://api.notion.com/v1/users"
        headers = {
            "Authorization": f"Bearer {notion_secret}",
            "Notion-Version": "2022-06-28",
        }

        response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
        response.raise_for_status()

        data = response.json()
        results = data['results']

        records = []
        for user in results:
            id = user['id']
            type = user['type']
            name = user.get('name', '')
            avatar_url = user.get('avatar_url', '')

            record_data = {
                "id": id,
                "type": type,
                "name": name,
                "avatar_url": avatar_url,
            }

            output = "User:\n"
            for key, value in record_data.items():
                output += f"{key.replace('_', ' ').title()}: {value}\n"
            output += "________________________\n"

            record = Record(text=output, data=record_data)
            records.append(record)

        self.status = "\n".join(record.text for record in records)
        return records
code.name: code

node.description: Retrieve users from Notion.

input_value.name: input_value
input_value.info: Text or Record to be passed as input.

code.name: code

record_template.name: record_template
record_template.info: Template to convert Record to Text. If left empty, it will be dynamically set to the Record's text key.

code.value:
from typing import Optional, Union

from axiestudio.base.io.chat import ChatComponent
from axiestudio.field_typing import Text
from axiestudio.schema import Record


class ChatOutput(ChatComponent):
    display_name = "Chat Output"
    description = "Display a chat message in the Playground."
    icon = "ChatOutput"

    def build(
        self,
        sender: Optional[str] = "Machine",
        sender_name: Optional[str] = "AI",
        input_value: Optional[str] = None,
        session_id: Optional[str] = None,
        return_record: Optional[bool] = False,
        record_template: Optional[str] = "{text}",
    ) -> Union[Text, Record]:
        return super().build_with_record(
            sender=sender,
            sender_name=sender_name,
            input_value=input_value,
            session_id=session_id,
            return_record=return_record,
            record_template=record_template or "",
        )
code.name: code

record_template.name: record_template
record_template.info: In case of Message being a Record, this template will be used to convert it to text.

return_record.name: return_record
return_record.info: Return the message as a record containing the sender, sender_name, and session_id.

session_id.name: session_id
session_id.info: If provided, the message will be stored in the memory.

template.name: template
template.info: The template to use for formatting the records. It can contain the keys {text}, {data} or any other key in the Record.

code.value:
from datetime import datetime
from zoneinfo import ZoneInfo
from typing import List

from axiestudio import CustomComponent
from axiestudio.field_typing import Text


class CurrentDateComponent(CustomComponent):
    display_name = "Current Date"
    description = "Returns the current date in the selected timezone."

    def build_config(self):
        return {
            "timezone": {
                "display_name": "Timezone",
                "field_type": "str",
                "options": [
                    "UTC",
                    "US/Eastern",
                    "US/Central",
                    "US/Mountain",
                    "US/Pacific",
                    "Europe/London",
                    "Europe/Paris",
                    "Asia/Tokyo",
                    "Australia/Sydney",
                    "America/Sao_Paulo",
                    "America/Cuiaba",
                ],
                "value": "UTC",
            },
        }

    def build(self, timezone: str) -> Text:
        try:
            tz = ZoneInfo(timezone)
            current_date = datetime.now(tz).strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
            self.status = f"Current date in {timezone}: {current_date}"
            return current_date
        except Exception as e:
            self.status = f"Error: {str(e)}"
            raise e
code.name: code

input_value.info: Text or Record to be passed as input.

query_payload.name: query_payload
query_payload.info: A JSON string containing the filters that will be used for querying the database. EG: {'filter': {'property': 'Status', 'status': {'equals': 'In progress'}}}

node.description:
Query a Notion database with filtering and sorting. The input should be a JSON string containing the 'filter' and 'sorts' objects. Example input:
{"filter": {"property": "Status", "select": {"equals": "Done"}}, "sorts": [{"timestamp": "created_time", "direction": "descending"}]}

code.name: code

json_mode.name: json_mode
json_mode.info: Enable JSON mode for the model output.

openai_api_base.name: openai_api_base
openai_api_base.info:
The base URL of the OpenAI API. Defaults to https://api.openai.com/v1.

You can change this to use other APIs like JinaChat, LocalAI and Prem.

openai_api_key.name: openai_api_key
openai_api_key.info: The OpenAI API Key to use for the OpenAI model.

seed.name: seed
seed.info: The seed controls the reproducibility of the job.

stream.name: stream
stream.info: Stream the response from the model. Streaming works only in Chat.

system_message.name: system_message
system_message.info: System message to pass to the model.

node.description: Generates text using OpenAI LLMs, with optional JSON Mode and Seed parameters.

code.value:
from typing import Optional, Union

from axiestudio.base.io.chat import ChatComponent
from axiestudio.field_typing import Text
from axiestudio.schema import Record


class ChatInput(ChatComponent):
    display_name = "Chat Input"
    description = "Get chat inputs from the Playground."
    icon = "ChatInput"

    def build_config(self):
        build_config = super().build_config()
        build_config["input_value"] = {
            "input_types": [],
            "display_name": "Message",
            "multiline": True,
        }

        return build_config

    def build(
        self,
        sender: Optional[str] = "User",
        sender_name: Optional[str] = "User",
        input_value: Optional[str] = None,
        session_id: Optional[str] = None,
        return_record: Optional[bool] = False,
    ) -> Union[Text, Record]:
        return super().build_no_record(
            sender=sender,
            sender_name=sender_name,
            input_value=input_value,
            session_id=session_id,
            return_record=return_record,
        )
code.name: code

input_value.name: input_value
input_value.value: create a task to cezar, for him to brush his hair by tomorrow.

return_record.name: return_record
return_record.info: Return the message as a record containing the sender, sender_name, and session_id.

session_id.name: session_id
session_id.info: If provided, the message will be stored in the memory.
